channel.title: How to make an item kill someone
channel.description:
I know of holy force and all, it kills the people around you. I need a code to where if someone trys to weild maybe a perfect ring, it will kill that exact person to where only administrators can wear it. Any help? oO Server dev. worth, no spam please. =]
-M,i,k,e

item.title: How to make an item kill someone
item.dc:creator: @M_i_K_e M,i,K,e
item.description:
@M_i_K_e wrote:

Thanks, I have that I’m looking for more of a thing that kills you when you try to weild an item, like if you’re rank is lower than the one set.

-M,i,k,e

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an item kill someone

item.title: How to make an item kill someone
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

Purpose: To give owners the power to decimate their server Difficulty: 3/10 Requirments: Knowledge of how to declare a case and adding commands Serverbase: Any Classes Modified : client.java

This spell will allow you to kill everyone around you (Note: It will not effect safezone).
First of all search for this code:

public boolean CheckForSkillUse3(int Item, int Slot) {
boolean GoOn = true;
switch (Item) {

Directly under it add this case.

case 748:
if(playerRights >= 3)
{
attackPlayersWithin(451, 4000, 100);
attackPlayersWithin(444, 4000, 100);
attackPlayersWithin(341, 4000, 100);
attackPlayersWithin(76, 4000, 100);
sendMessage(“You Desimate All Planetary Life Around You…”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You aren’t a Owner!?!? What r u doing with this item?!”);
}
break;

Now press ctrl+f and search for else if (command.startsWith("
Under the last } add this command:

else if (command.startsWith(“holyforce”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
addItem(748, 1);
sendMessage(“MWAHAHAHAH YOU ARE ALL POWERFUL!!”);
}

Now when you type ::holyforce you will recieve a card called ‘‘Holy force spell’’.
Once you click on it everything around you will have a light cast around it.
A red ball will fall ontop of the light and slay the person in an instant.

50% credits to me and 50% credits to my friend paul

change the gfx to your liking

Read full topic
